metadata.author: A. Mass Flooring & Tile
metadata.og:title: A-Mass Flooring & Tile | Massachusetts Flooring and Tile Experts
metadata.og:description: Top-rated Massachusetts flooring and tile company offering expert residential and commercial services in tile, hardwood flooring, dustless sanding, luxury vinyl plank and tile (LVP/LVT), carpet, VCT, rubber, and sheet flooring. We also specialize in high-quality kitchen and bathroom renovations.
metadata.og:image:alt: A. Mass Flooring & Tile - Massachusetts flooring and renovation experts
metadata.twitter:title: A-Mass Flooring & Tile | Massachusetts Flooring and Tile Experts
metadata.twitter:description: Top-rated Massachusetts flooring and tile company offering expert residential and commercial services. Specializing in hardwood, luxury vinyl, tile installation, kitchen and bathroom renovations.
metadata.twitter:image:alt: A. Mass Flooring & Tile - Massachusetts flooring experts

title: A-Mass Flooring & Tile | Massachusetts Flooring Installation & Renovation Experts
description: Top-rated Massachusetts flooring contractors specializing in professional hardwood, luxury vinyl (LVP/LVT), tile installation, kitchen remodeling & bathroom renovations. Serving residential & commercial clients with dustless sanding, carpet, epoxy & specialty flooring. Licensed & insured. Free quotes.

stylesheets: @font-face { font-family: 'Fjalla One'; src: url('/assets/fonts/Fjalla_One/FjallaOne-Regular.ttf') format('truetype'); font-weight: normal; }
html { font-family: system-ui, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji'; line-height: 1.15; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; tab-size: 4; height: 100%; }
body { margin: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; font-family: Open Sans, sans-serif; color: #fff; letter-spacing: 0.06rem; }
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { font-family: 'Fjalla One', sans-serif; letter-spacing: 2px; font-weight: 500; margin-top: 0; line-height: 1.2; }
button, input, optgroup, select, textarea { font-family: inherit; font-size: 100%; line-height: 1.15; margin: 0; background: none; }
.content { height: 100%; overflow-y: scroll; scroll-snap-type: y mandatory; scroll-behavior: smooth;}
.wrapper { width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; padding: 0 25px; margin: 0 auto; box-sizing: border-box;}
.center { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
.space-apart { display: flex; gap: 20px; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; }

button, .btn {all: unset; cursor: pointer; font-weight: bold; color: var(--accent-color); font-weight: 700; font-size: 1.3rem; text-transform: capitalize; padding: 15px 35px; border-radius: 3px; background-color: #fff; white-space: nowrap;}
.view-section { min-height: 100vh; color: var(--accent-color); overflow: hidden; scroll-snap-align: start;}
@media (max-width: 875px) { .view-section h2 { font-size: 4rem; margin-bottom: 5px; } .view-section p { font-size: 1.2rem; margin: 0 0 10px; } }
.thumbnail { position: relative; width: 100%; padding-top: 56.25%; overflow: hidden; background: #eee; border-radius: 3px; }
.thumbnail > img { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; }
